languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, в прошлый раз ваше участие помогло разрешить ситуацию, где моя {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}закостенелость{/d} лишь мешала. При всем уважении к госпоже Зауэрбэк, возможно ей не помешал бы ваш свежий взгляд".

"Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, в прошлый раз ваше участие помогло разрешить ситуацию, где моя {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}закостенелость{/d} лишь мешала. При всем уважении к госпоже Зауэрбэк, возможно ей не помешал бы ваш свежий взгляд".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, your intervention helped resolve a situation where my {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only made matters worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she could use a fresh perspective which you could provide."

"Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, your intervention helped resolve a situation where my {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only made matters worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she could use a fresh perspective which you could provide."

"Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

"Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

"Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

"Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, en una ocasión anterior, su intervención resolvió un problema que mi propia {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidez{/d} solo consiguió empeorar. Con todo el debido respeto hacia la maestra Sauerback, escuchar su particular perspectiva podría beneficiar a la investigación».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, en una ocasión anterior, su intervención resolvió un problema que mi propia {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidez{/d} solo consiguió empeorar. Con todo el debido respeto hacia la maestra Sauerback, escuchar su particular perspectiva podría beneficiar a la investigación».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、前回は、私自身の{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}硬直化{/d}により事態を悪化させる一方だった問題を解決に導いたのは、あなたの介入でした。ザウアーバック女史には敬意を表しますが、彼女もあなたの新鮮な視点から恩恵を受けることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、前回は、私自身の{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}硬直化{/d}により事態を悪化させる一方だった問題を解決に導いたのは、あなたの介入でした。ザウアーバック女史には敬意を表しますが、彼女もあなたの新鮮な視点から恩恵を受けることでしょう」

languages.text: “舰长大人，之前有那么一次，我的{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}固执{/d}让事情变得越来越糟，而您亲自出面干涉，顺利解决了问题。在我看来，您的新观点和新思路，或许会让苏尔贝克女士从中受益。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，之前有那么一次，我的{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}固执{/d}让事情变得越来越糟，而您亲自出面干涉，顺利解决了问题。在我看来，您的新观点和新思路，或许会让苏尔贝克女士从中受益。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, bei einer früheren Gelegenheit hat Euer Eingreifen eine Situation gerettet, die meine eigene {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}Unbeweglichkeit{/d} nur schlimmer gemacht hat. Bei allem Respekt für Herrin Sauerback, sie könnte vielleicht von Eurer frischen Perspektive profitieren."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, bei einer früheren Gelegenheit hat Euer Eigreifen eine Situation gerettet, die meine eigene {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}Unbeweglichkeit{/d} nur schlimmer gemacht hat. Bei allem Respekt für Herrin Sauerback, sie könnte vielleicht von Eurer frischen Perspektive profitieren."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, par le passé, vous avez résolu une affaire que ma propre {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidité{/d} ne faisait qu'aggraver. Avec tout le respect que je dois à maîtresse Sauerback, elle pourrait sans doute bénéficier de votre aide. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, par le passé, vous avez résolu une affaire que ma propre {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidité{/d} ne faisait qu'aggraver. Avec tout le respect que je dois à maîtresse Sauerback, elle pourrait sans doute bénéficier de votre aide. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, daha önce benim {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}esneklik göstermemem{/d} sebebiyle kötü bir hâl alan durum, sizin müdahaleniz sayesinde çözülmüştü. Üstat Sauerback saygısızlık olarak algılamasın, belki de sizin taze bakış açınızdan faydalanabilir."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, on a previous occasion, it was your intervention that resolved a matter that my own {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}rigidity{/d} had only succeeded in making worse. With all due respect to Mistress Sauerback, perhaps she would benefit from your fresh perspective."
